title: New Romantics (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:15.58] We're all bored, we're all so tired of everything
[00:19.73] We wait for trains that just aren't comin'
[00:23.49] We show off our different scarlet letters
[00:27.65] Trust me, mine is better
[00:31.46] We're so young, but we're on the road to ruin
[00:35.31] We play dumb but we know exactly what we're doin'
[00:39.18] We cry tears of mascara in the bathroom
[00:42.97] Honey, life is just a classroom
[00:45.39] (Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
[00:48.41] 'Cause baby, I could build a castle
[00:52.70] Out of all the bricks they threw at me
[00:56.32] And every day is like a battle
[01:00.39] But every night with us is like a dream
[01:03.46] Baby, we're the new romantics, come on, come along with me
[01:07.02] Heartbreak is the national anthem, we sing it proudly
[01:11.33] We are too busy dancing to get knocked off our feet
[01:15.35] Baby, we're the new romantics
[01:17.10] The best people in life are free
[01:20.41] We're all here, the lights and noise are blinding
[01:24.54] We hang back, it's all in the timing
[01:28.40] It's poker, he can't see it in my face
[01:31.94] But I'm about to play my Ace (ah)
[01:36.32] We need love, but all we want is danger
[01:40.17] We team up, then switch sides like a record changer
[01:44.11] The rumors are terrible and cruel
[01:47.53] But honey, most of them are true
[01:50.52] (Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
[01:53.43] 'Cause baby, I could build a castle
[01:57.61] Out of all the bricks they threw at me
[02:01.34] And every day is like a battle
[02:05.38] But every night with us is like a dream
[02:08.40] Baby, we're the new romantics, come on, come along with me
[02:12.28] Heartbreak is the national anthem, we sing it proudly
[02:16.19] We are too busy dancing to get knocked off our feet
[02:20.25] Baby, we're the new romantics
[02:22.04] The best people in life are free
[02:24.39] (Oh, oh, oh-oh, oh) oh
[02:27.53] 
[02:30.15] So, come on, come along with me
[02:32.51] (Oh-oh, oh)
[02:33.79] The best people in life are free
[02:36.85] (Oh-oh, oh)
[02:39.92] Please, take my hand and
[02:43.82] Please, take me dancing and
[02:47.94] Please, leave me stranded
[02:50.18] It's so romantic (it's so romantic)
[02:55.44] (Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
[02:57.88] (Oh-oh, oh)
[02:58.64] 'Cause baby, I could build a castle
[03:02.54] Out of all the bricks they threw at me
[03:06.39] And every day is like a battle (oh-oh)
[03:10.39] But every night with us is like a dream (is like a dream)
[03:14.25] 'Cause baby, I could build a castle (castle)
[03:18.24] Out of all the bricks they threw at me (and)
[03:22.01] And every day is like a battle (oh)
[03:25.93] But every night with us is like a dream
[03:29.26] Baby, we're the new romantics, come on, come along with me
[03:32.95] Heartbreak is the national anthem, we sing it proudly
[03:37.05] We are too busy dancin' (hey), to get knocked off our feet
[03:40.90] Baby, we're the new romantics
[03:42.76] The best people in life are free
[03:45.35]
